A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In the course of her training, the girl meets a charming aristocrat who offers to support her in her sporting ambitions. His mother, a sophisticated woman in her fifties, chases the horse and tries to sabotage the relationship. Other performers include Ron Moody , Patrick Holt , and Oliver Reed .

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century.
